title: Want to change nationality of account
body: Hi I'm one of the big fan of the league of legends. For the family issues, I have to go back to permanently. I was trying to change account to Korea account but i couldn't find it. I bought so many my lovely skins so i want to play my account in Korean server. Can you please change in to Korean account? I can even pay for it and I don't care about my rank, just want to keep my skins and champions. Thanks so much and have a nice day.

replies.body: Unfortunately it's not possible at this time to transfer account to the KR servers because of the restrictions on the accounts and the isolation of the server. It's also unlikely that it will be possible any time soon (if ever) given the laws in place.

Go to the store (in client), and click on the "account" button (second icon right of the "purchase RP" button).
There you can buy a region transfer for 1300 RP.

You can't transfer to KR that way unfortunately. I think honestly it might not be possible because of the restrictions on the region. I'll have to ask around for more on this one cause I really don't know myself.
ice done it in the past because of "pre season" they removed it not hard to re enable it

We're not talking about region transfers in general, only transfers to Korea. Transfers to KR have never been available. It may be possible to transfer an account *out* of KR, I'm not sure of that, but so far as I can tell it's never been possible to transfer to.
